thoughts.text: I think it would be helpful to browse a website to gather more information on a topic. I will use the 'browse_website' command to navigate to a website and search for relevant information.
thoughts.reasoning: Browsing a website can be a great way to gather information on a topic. I will use the 'browse_website' command to navigate to a website and search for relevant information.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'browse_website' command to navigate to a website
- Search for relevant information on the topic
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am searching for reliable and accurate information on the topic.
thoughts.speak: I will use the 'browse_website' command to navigate to a website and search for relevant information.
